maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye tharuna sila samadanaya perawaru 6.00 – 7.00 sil samadan karawima, anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa laggala asama himi, 8.00 – 9.00 bhawanawa walimada pasannamanasa himi, 9.00 – 10.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi panditha ilwane aananda himi, 10.00 – 11.15 paropakara sangrahaya anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa shasthrapathi panditha mahaoya anuuruddha himi, paswaru 12.25 – 12.30 wishesha niwedana ha punyanumodana, 12.30 – 1.00 pirith ha theruwan guna oopanayaka dhammawiraga himi, 1.00 – 2.00 dharma sakachchawa shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 2.00 – 3.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrawedi hingure panynyasekara himi, 3.00 – 4.00 dharma deshanawa walpola gothama himi, 4.15 – 5.00 dhammapadaya shasthrapathi panditha gabbela wajira himi, 5.00 – 6.00 dharma deshanawa diyathalawe piyadassi himi, 6.00 – 6.30 bodhi pujawa shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri mahimi.

guwan widuli tharanga gana ohu danna siyalu da ohuta kiya dun, ' aadhunikayan sandaha guwan widuli athpotha-1965' athata gath ohu, ehi mathupita thanpathwa thibu sihin hima patalaya pisa damiya.wiwidha batari ha mitara eewa damu damu thanwalama thibu athara, samahara batari thawamath kriyakala haki thathwayaka thibima, ohuge sithata aswasillak wiya.guwan widuli yanthrayata awasi balaya, thana thana wisiri thibu batariwalin sapaya gath ohu, chakithayen sitha gasseddi, yanthraya thawamath kriyathmaka kala haki dayi piriksiya.

mema thalpath anuwa hatharawana parakramabahu raju yatathe senkadagala purayehi pradeshika palanaya karagena giya ohuge siriwardhana nam senewiyage arayuma paridi yapahuwe walasgala wisu widarshanadhuritha bhikshun saya namak ehi sita maha peraharin bu.wa. 1850 di hewath kri.wa. 1312 wesak pura poho dinata pera pitath karawa rathri athkanda wiharayehi langum ganwa wesak poho dina sawas bhagayedi warthamana "thrithwa widyalaya" bhumiyata wadamawa ehi mahanuwara asgiri wiharaya widarshana dhuritha bhikshun wahanselage senasunak lesa aarambha karana ladi.

mita pera heli wu aakarayata mahinda rajapaksha mahatha uthure palath sabha mathiwaranaya pawathwannata pera idam ha polis balathala palath sabhawalin iwath karannata yojana karana yojanawak amathya mandalayata idiripath kala athara diw gunasekara , rajitha senarathna aadin eyata ekahelama wiruddhawa kabinat mandalaya thula eya parajaya kara thibina.ee gana helikaramin diw gunasekara mahatha prakasha kara thibune panathata kabinat mandalaya thula dadi sahayak pala kala wimal wirawansha mahatha athulu pirisak bawath thamanta ee handa yatapath karannata bahu balayada yodannata siduwu bawathya.
